Class AppointmentHandler

java.lang.Object
handlers.AppointmentHandler

public class AppointmentHandler extends Object implements IAppointmentHandler
AppointmentHandler, logic for appointments

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public void recordAppointmentOutcome(Doctor doctor, String patientIdentifier, String appointmentIdentifier, String services, String notes, Prescription prescription)
      Method to record a new appointment outcome for an appointment This allows the doctor to record the outcome of a patient's appointment
      Specified by:
      recordAppointmentOutcome in interface IAppointmentHandler
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor who wrote the appointment outcome
      patientIdentifier - patient associated to this appointment outcome
      appointmentIdentifier - the appointment associated to this appointment outcome
      services - a description of the services provided during the appointment
      notes - additional notes regarding the outcome
      prescription - prescription issued for the appointment
